languages.text: "Отсеку надо больше блюстителей, и вы вроде как за рекрутов сойдете. Отмоем вас, вобьем в башку дисциплины побольше — и на службу".

traits.locale_text: "Отсеку надо больше блюстителей, и вы вроде как за рекрутов сойдете. Отмоем вас, вобьем в башку дисциплины побольше — и на службу".

languages.text: "The compartment needs more enforcers, so consider yourselves drafted. We'll wash you off, drum a bit more discipline into you, and put you to work."
languages.original_text: "Отсеку надо больше блюстителей, и вы вроде как за рекрутов сойдете. Отмоем вас, вобьем в башку дисциплины побольше — и на службу".

traits.locale_text: "The compartment needs more enforcers, so consider yourselves drafted. We'll wash you off, drum a bit more discipline into you, and put you to work."
"The compartment needs more enforcers, so consider yourselves drafted. We'll wash you off, drum a bit more discipline into you, and put you to work."
"The compartment needs more enforcers, so consider yourselves drafted. We'll wash you off, drum a bit more discipline into you, and put you to work."
"The compartment needs more enforcers, so consider yourselves drafted. We'll wash you off, drum a bit more discipline into you, and put you to work."
"The compartment needs more enforcers, so consider yourselves drafted. We'll wash you off, drum a bit more discipline into you, and put you to work."

languages.text: «Hacen falta más guardias en el compartimento, así que consideraos reclutados. Os lavaremos un poco, os inculcaremos algo de disciplina y os pondremos a trabajar».
languages.original_text: "The compartment needs more enforcers, so consider yourselves drafted. We'll wash you off, drum a bit more discipline into you, and put you to work."

traits.locale_text: «Hacen falta más guardias en el compartimento, así que consideraos reclutados. Os lavaremos un poco, os inculcaremos algo de disciplina y os pondremos a trabajar».

languages.text: 「区画にはもっとエンフォーサーが必要だ。だから徴兵されたと思ってくれ。体を洗って、もう少し規律を身につけさせ、仕事につかせる」
languages.original_text: "The compartment needs more enforcers, so consider yourselves drafted. We'll wash you off, drum a bit more discipline into you, and put you to work."

traits.locale_text: 「区画にはもっとエンフォーサーが必要だ。だから徴兵されたと思ってくれ。体を洗って、もう少し規律を身につけさせ、仕事につかせる」

languages.text: “这片区域需要更多执法者，你们已经被征召入伍了。我们准备先把你们洗干净，教会你们什么叫纪律，然后你们就可以干活了。”
languages.original_text: "The compartment needs more enforcers, so consider yourselves drafted. We'll wash you off, drum a bit more discipline into you, and put you to work."

traits.locale_text: “这片区域需要更多执法者，你们已经被征召入伍了。我们准备先把你们洗干净，教会你们什么叫纪律，然后你们就可以干活了。”

languages.text: "Das Modul braucht mehr Enforcer, also betrachtet euch als rekrutiert. Wir werden euch waschen, ein wenig Disziplin einbläuen und arbeiten lassen."
languages.original_text: "The compartment needs more enforcers, so consider yourselves drafted. We'll wash you off, drum a bit more discipline into you, and put you to work."

traits.locale_text: "Das Modul braucht mehr Enforcer, also betrachtet euch als rekrutiert. Wir werden euch waschen, ein wenig Disziplin einbläuen und arbeiten lassen."

languages.text: « Le compartiment manque de prévôts, et vous ferez bien l'affaire. On va vous laver, vous inculquer un semblant de discipline et ensuite, on vous mettra au travail. »
languages.original_text: "The compartment needs more enforcers, so consider yourselves drafted. We'll wash you off, drum a bit more discipline into you, and put you to work."

traits.locale_text: « Le compartiment manque de prévôts, et vous ferez bien l'affaire. On va vous laver, vous inculquer un semblant de discipline et ensuite, on vous mettra au travail. »

languages.text: "Kompartımanda daha çok infazcıya ihtiyaç var, kendinizi işe alınmış sayabilirsiniz. Yıkanıp adam edileceksiniz, sonra da iş başı yapacaksınız."
languages.original_text: "The compartment needs more enforcers, so consider yourselves drafted. We'll wash you off, drum a bit more discipline into you, and put you to work."
